title: MSL Toolkit
description: This toolkit provides Menu, Settings, and Localization systems, with a wide range of features that can fit any project needs.
longDescription:
Quick:
  • Demonstration video and tutorial playlist: Youtube Link!
  • Playable Demo(old version): Download Link!


(UPD - 2022)

I am happy to announce all my Unreal Engine content is free now!

I hope to support more content creators in the future!

Latest info about content in the video ~ Youtube Link!

Please watch the video, it explains my current situation and info about support.

Also use the discord channel for any questions or support now ~ Discord Link!


About:

This toolkit provides Menu, Settings, and Localization systems, with a wide range of features that can fit any project needs.

It can be used to build complex Menus with gamepad/keyboard/mouse navigation working seamlessly.

Menu system is a folder hierarchy based system, with the use of interaction presets, it can be used to create menus of any complexity level.

The Settings system is implemented with easy adding custom settings and their behavior has input rebinding and saving/loading.

Localization system is a very useful tool to use localize text and audio archives, and is more superior than the engine's default localization dashboard.

Upgraded savegame system now, with folder based hierarchy feature, much precise and easy saving data and prioritized actors loading, to boot and init some actors earlier than others for complex systems.

All those systems can work separately but they are compatible with each other, in the example demonstration they are working together.

This system can help and speed up any menu building process in the engine and save much time, this is very big and complex system with simplified workflow.


Note:

Versions: 4.19.2-4.24+

The projects made in older engine versions should work fine in newer engine versions by default, in most cases there is no need for update if it's outdated, but sometimes the engine does change some functions and it may lead to errors in newer engine versions, if you found any errors then notify us and we will make quick fix for the new engine version.

Recommended to have at least basic understanding of blueprints, do not purchase this system if you are very new to engine, if you need help or have questions then write to our support email.

technicalDetails:
Features:

  • Menu builder system with easy ability to control menus with any device input by using interaction data.
  • Settings system with feature of using data-based settings, CSV importing, input rebinding, saving/loading.
  • Localization system, using archive based localization data, text/audio with easy use in any part of project.
  • Example main menu with options and saving/loading menu is provided with all working features.
  • Gamepad icons from example demonstration are included for both PS4 and Xbox one.
  • Advanced savegame system with folder-based hierarchy logic, which easily saves complex game data.


Disk Size: 30.9 MB

Number of Blueprints: 4 system actors, 1 component.

Input: Gamepad/Keyboard/Mouse

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: PC, Consoles, Mobile/Tested only on Win

Supported Target Build Platforms: All/Tested only on Win


New version is compatible with engine versions: 4.19.2-4.26

About version compatibility: The projects made in older engine versions should work fine in newer engine versions by default, in most cases there is no need for update if it's outdated, but sometimes the engine does change some functions and it may lead to errors in newer engine versions, if you found any errors then notify us and we will make quick fix for the new engine version.

Recommended to have at least basic understanding of blueprints, do not purchase this system if you are very new to engine, if you need help or have questions then write to our support email.
